title: Loot & Crafting with ARAM
body:
I only play ARAM these days, I have zero champion mastery but well over 2k ARAM wins, and have collected around 10 keys so far, but I have nothing to unlock with them.
Are there any plans to add loot drop options to ARAM or do I have to play rift for chests?

replies.body: There was a thing saying that were looking at taking Champion Mastery into ARAM (and Twisted Treeline) however there wasn't a timeline on it, and i'm not sure if it stated they would move hextech chests over to there.
Can you point me in the direction of these posts plz?

So thought i would repost here since it just came up.

>6.12

>Champion Mastery on both Howling Abyss and Twisted Treeline.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/state-season-mid-season-followup
